query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `client_product_relations` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `clientId` int NOT NULL,
  `skuId` int NOT NULL,
  `supplierId` int NOT NULL,
  `qualityTier` enum('standard','premium','seasonal') DEFAULT 'standard',
  `costPriceJpy` decimal(12,2) NOT NULL,
  `exchangeRate` decimal(10,6) NOT NULL,
  `shippingFeePerKg` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT '15.00',
  `importTaxRate` decimal(5,4) DEFAULT '0.0900',
  `importTaxAmountSgd` decimal(12,2),
  `totalLandedCostSgd` decimal(12,2),
  `sellingPricePerKg` decimal(12,2) NOT NULL,
  `specialDiscountPercent` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT '0.00',
  `profitPerKgSgd` decimal(12,2),
  `monthlyPurchaseQtyKg` decimal(12,3) NOT NULL,
  `totalProfitPerMonthSgd` decimal(14,2),
  `annualizedProfitSgd` decimal(14,2),
  `allocatedInventoryKg` decimal(12,3) DEFAULT '0.000',
  `lastOrderDate` timestamp NULL,
  `lastStockArrivalDate` timestamp NULL,
  `orderingCadence` enum('1_month','2_months') DEFAULT '1_month',
  `nextDeliveryDate` timestamp NULL,
  `daysUntilNextOrder` int,
  `quantityRequiredToFulfillKg` decimal(12,3),
  `hasNegativeProfit` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `hasInsufficientInventory` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `hasMissedReorderWindow` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `isActive` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdBy` int,
  `updatedBy` int
);
command:
